009package Ch26_MSER;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
013
014import java.awt.Color;
015import java.awt.Font;
016import java.util.List;
017
018import ij.IJ;
019import ij.ImagePlus;
020import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
021import ij.gui.Overlay;
022import ij.gui.Roi;
023import ij.io.LogStream;
024import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
025import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
026import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
027import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
028import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
029import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
031import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
032import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
033import imagingbook.common.mser.MserColor;
034import imagingbook.common.mser.MserData;
035import imagingbook.common.mser.MserDetector;
036import imagingbook.common.mser.MserDetector.Parameters;
037import imagingbook.common.mser.components.Component;
038import imagingbook.common.mser.components.PixelMap.Pixel;
039
040/**
041 * Runs MSER detection on the current image and produces a color image
042 * with vector overlay.
043 * 
044 * @author WB
045 *
046 */
047public class MSER_Detect implements PlugInFilter {
048        
049        static {
050                LogStream.redirectSystem();
051        }
052        
053        private static boolean ShowMserCount = true;
054        private static boolean ShowEllipses = true;
055        private static boolean MarkMserPixels = false;
056        private static boolean ShowColorPalette = false;
057        private static boolean ShowMserLabels = false;
058        private static boolean ShowElapsedTime = false;
059        
060        // processing direction
061        private static boolean BlackToWhite = true;             // default
062        private static boolean WhiteToBlack = false;    // detect on inverted image
063        
064        private static boolean UseTwoColorsOnly = false;        // detect on inverted image
065        private Color BlackToWhiteColor = MserColor.Yellow.getColor(); //.Orange;
066        private Color WhiteToBlackColor = MserColor.Cyan.getColor();
067        
068        private static int MinDisplayWidth = 300;
069        
070        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();    // MSER parameters
071        
072
073        ImagePlus im = null;
074        
075        private Color[] colors = null;
076        
077
078        
079        private double ellipseStrokeWidth = 0;          // set dynamically
080        private int labelFontSize = 0;                          // set dynamically
081        private Font labelFont = null;                          // set dynamically
082        
083        
084        Roi roi = null;
085        ByteProcessor bp = null;
086        ImageProcessor cp = null;
087        Overlay oly = null;
088        
089        @Override
090        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
091                this.im = im;
092                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
093        }
094        
095        @Override
096        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
097                roi = im.getRoi();
098                ellipseStrokeWidth = Math.max(0.25, ip.getWidth() * 0.1 / 100);
099                labelFontSize = Math.max(3, (int) Math.round(ip.getWidth() / 100.0));   
100                                
101                if (!runDialog(params)) {
102                        return;
103                }
104                
105                bp = ip.convertToByteProcessor();
106                cp = (MarkMserPixels) ? ip.convertToColorProcessor() : ip.convertToByteProcessor();
107                oly = new Overlay();
108                String title = im.getShortTitle() + "-MSER";
109                
110                if (BlackToWhite || WhiteToBlack) title = title + "-";
111                if (BlackToWhite)  title = title + "B";
112                if (WhiteToBlack)  title = title + "W";
113                if (UseTwoColorsOnly) title = title + "-2c";
114                
115                Color[] palette = MserColor.LevelColors;
116                
117                labelFont = new Font(Font.SANS_SERIF, Font.PLAIN, labelFontSize);
118                
119                MserDetector detector = new MserDetector(params);
120                
121                List<Component<MserData>> msersB = null;
122                List<Component<MserData>> msersW = null;
123//              List<Component<MserData>> msersAll = new ArrayList<>();
124                
125                if (BlackToWhite) {
126                        msersB = detector.applyTo(bp);
127                        if (ShowMserCount) {
128                                IJ.log("Found MSERs (BlackToWhite): " + msersB.size());
129                        }
130                        if (UseTwoColorsOnly) 
131                                makeColorsBlackToWhite();
132                        else
133                                makeColors(palette);
134                        drawToOverlay(msersB);
135                }
136                
137                if (WhiteToBlack) {
138                        bp.invert();
139                        msersW = detector.applyTo(bp);  
140                        if (ShowMserCount) {
141                                IJ.log("Found MSERs (WhiteToBlack): " + msersW.size());
142                        }
143                        if (UseTwoColorsOnly) 
144                                makeColorsWhiteToBlack();
145                        else
146                                makeColors(palette);
147                        drawToOverlay(msersW);
148                }
149                
150                if (ShowElapsedTime) {
151                        IJ.log(String.format("Algorithm %s: time elapsed %.0fms", params.method, detector.getElapsedTime()));
152                }
153        
154                
155                if (ShowColorPalette) {
156                        if (UseTwoColorsOnly) 
157                                showTwoColors();
158                        else
159                                showColorPalette(title + "-palette");
160                }
161                
162                // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
163                
164//              Component.sortBySize(msersAll); // optional
165//              drawToOverlay(msersAll);
166                
167                ImagePlus cimp = new ImagePlus(title, cp);
168                setMserImageProps(cimp, params);
169                cimp.setOverlay(oly);
170                cimp.show();
171                
172                // zoom result image if too small
173                if (cimp.getWidth() < MinDisplayWidth) {
174                        int zoomFac = (int) Math.ceil((double) MinDisplayWidth / cimp.getWidth());
175                        GuiTools.zoomExact(cimp, zoomFac);
176                }       
177        }
178         
179        private void drawToOverlay(List<Component<MserData>> msers) {
180                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
181                ola.setFont(labelFont);
182                
183                for (Component<MserData> c : msers) {
184                        
185                        // ignore MSERs outside the current ROI (if specified)
186                        Pnt2d ctr = c.getProperties().getCenter();
187                        if (roi != null && !roi.containsPoint(ctr.getX(), ctr.getY())) {
188                                continue;
189                        }
190                        
191                        Color vecCol = getColor(c.getLevel());
192                        
193                        // draw contained points
194                        if (MarkMserPixels) {
195                                float[] hsb = Color.RGBtoHSB(vecCol.getRed(), vecCol.getGreen(), vecCol.getBlue(), null);
196                                Color pixCol = Color.getHSBColor(hsb[0], 0.5f, 0.5f);
197                                cp.setColor(pixCol);
198                                for (Pixel pnt : c.getAllPixels()) {
199                                        cp.drawDot(pnt.x, pnt.y);
200                                }
201                        }
202                        
203                        if (ShowEllipses) {
204                                // suggests 0.2% of image width as stroke width (but at least 0.5)                      
205                                GeometricEllipse ellipse = c.getProperties().getEllipse();
206                                ola.addShape(ellipse.getShape(), new ColoredStroke(ellipseStrokeWidth, vecCol));
207                                
208                                if (ShowMserLabels) {
209                                        ola.setTextColor(vecCol);
210                                        ola.addText(ellipse.xc, ellipse.yc, Integer.toString(c.ID));
211                                }
212                        }
213                }
214        }
215        
216        // --------------------------------------------
217        
218        private boolean runDialog(Parameters params) {
219                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
220                
221//              gd.addEnumChoice("Component tree method", params.method);
222//              gd.addNumericField("Delta:", params.delta, 0);
223//              gd.addNumericField("Max variation (%)", params.maxSizeVariation * 100, 0);
224//              gd.addNumericField("Min diversity (%)", params.minDiversity * 100, 0);
225//              gd.addNumericField("Max rel. area (%)", params.maxRelCompSize * 100, 0);
226//              gd.addNumericField("Min rel. area (%)", params.minRelCompSize * 100, 0);
227//              gd.addNumericField("Min abs. area (pixel)", params.minAbsComponentArea, 0);
228//              gd.addNumericField("Min region compactness (%)", params.minCompactness * 100, 0);
229//              gd.addCheckbox("Constrain ellipse size", params.constrainEllipseSize);
230                addToDialog(params, gd);
231                
232                gd.addCheckbox("BLACK -> WHITE", BlackToWhite);
233                gd.addCheckbox("WHITE -> BLACK", WhiteToBlack);
234                gd.addCheckbox("Use 2 colors only", UseTwoColorsOnly);
235                
236                gd.addMessage("Output:");
237                gd.addCheckbox("Show MSER count", ShowMserCount);
238                gd.addCheckbox("Show elapsed time", ShowElapsedTime);
239                gd.addCheckbox("Show ellipses", ShowEllipses);
240                gd.addNumericField("Ellipse stroke width", ellipseStrokeWidth, 2);
241                gd.addCheckbox("Show MSER labels", ShowMserLabels);
242                gd.addNumericField("Label font size", labelFontSize, 0);
243                gd.addCheckbox("Mark MSER pixels", MarkMserPixels);
244                gd.addCheckbox("Show color palette", ShowColorPalette);
245                
246                
247//              gd.addMessage("Debugging:");
248//              gd.addCheckbox("Validate component tree", params.validateComponentTree);
249                
250                gd.showDialog();
251                if (gd.wasCanceled())
252                        return false;
253
254//              params.method = gd.getNextEnumChoice(Method.class);
255//              params.delta = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
256//              params.maxSizeVariation = gd.getNextNumber() / 100;
257//              params.minDiversity = gd.getNextNumber() / 100;
258//              params.maxRelCompSize = gd.getNextNumber() / 100;
259//              params.minRelCompSize = gd.getNextNumber() / 100;
260//              params.minAbsComponentArea = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
261//              params.minCompactness = gd.getNextNumber() / 100;
262//              params.constrainEllipseSize = gd.getNextBoolean();      
263                getFromDialog(params, gd);
264                
265                BlackToWhite = gd.getNextBoolean();
266                WhiteToBlack = gd.getNextBoolean();
267                UseTwoColorsOnly = gd.getNextBoolean();
268                
269                // Output:
270                ShowMserCount = gd.getNextBoolean();
271                ShowElapsedTime = gd.getNextBoolean();
272                ShowEllipses = gd.getNextBoolean();
273                ellipseStrokeWidth = gd.getNextNumber();
274                ShowMserLabels = gd.getNextBoolean();
275                labelFontSize = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
276                MarkMserPixels = gd.getNextBoolean();
277                ShowColorPalette = gd.getNextBoolean();
278                                
279//              // Debugging:
280//              params.validateComponentTree = gd.getNextBoolean();
281                                
282                return true;
283        }
284        
285        // --------------------------------------------
286        
287        private void makeColors(Color[] palette) {
288                final int n = palette.length;
289                colors = new Color[256];
290                for (int level = 0; level < 256; level++) {
291                        int k = (int) (n * level / 256.0);              // k in [0,n-1]
292                        colors[level] = palette[k];
293                }
294        }
295        
296        private void makeColorsBlackToWhite() {
297                colors = new Color[256];
298                for (int level = 0; level < 256; level++) {
299                        colors[level] = BlackToWhiteColor;
300                }
301        }
302        
303        private void makeColorsWhiteToBlack() {
304                colors = new Color[256];
305                for (int level = 0; level < 256; level++) {
306                        colors[level] = WhiteToBlackColor;
307                }
308        }
309        
310        private Color getColor(int level) {
311                // level is in 0,..,255
312                if (level < 0) 
313                        level = 0;
314                if (level >= colors.length)
315                        level = colors.length - 1;
316                return colors[level];
317        }
318        
319        private void showColorPalette(String title) {
320                int W = 20;
321                int H = 256;
322                ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(W, H);
323                for (int level = 0; level < H; level++) {
324                        cp.setColor(getColor(level));
325                        for (int i = 0; i < W; i++) {
326                                cp.drawPixel(i, level);
327                        }
328                }
329                cp.flipVertical();
330                new ImagePlus(title, cp).show();
331        }
332        
333        private void showTwoColors() {
334                {
335                        ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(20, 64);
336                        cp.setColor(BlackToWhiteColor);
337                        cp.fill();
338                        new ImagePlus("color-BW", cp).show();
339                }
340                {
341                        ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(20, 64);
342                        cp.setColor(WhiteToBlackColor);
343                        cp.fill();
344                        new ImagePlus("color-WB", cp).show();
345                }
346        }
347
348        
349        // --------------------------------------------
350        
351        private void setMserImageProps(ImagePlus imp, Parameters params) {
352                imp.setProp("MSER-delta", params.delta);
353                imp.setProp("MSER-maxVariation", params.maxSizeVariation);
354                imp.setProp("MSER-minDiversity", params.minDiversity);
355                imp.setProp("MSER-maxRelArea", params.maxRelCompSize);
356                imp.setProp("MSER-minRelArea", params.minRelCompSize);
357                imp.setProp("MSER-minAbsArea", params.minAbsComponentArea);
358                imp.setProp("MSER-method", params.method.toString());   
359        }
360        
361}
